title: Healthcare Practical Competencies Enhancement: Game-Centered Learning (GCL) Model Development for Innovative Pedagogical Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational methodologies and interest in game-based learning
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the core principles of GCL (creativity, collaboration, exploration) to three or more real-world cases.
Learners can design and develop game-based educational scenarios tailored to learner levels and contexts.
Learners can analyze game elements that promote social interaction and incorporate them into evaluation criteria.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
